attributes.action: Simplify the current Tax system so that the average person can calculate their own tax situation without the use of a tax consultant.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the huge number of stealth taxes implemented by Mr Brown few people can now determine their own taxes. This has resulted in many people resorting to tax consultants. This should not be necessary. It was also reported that it takes the Inland Revenue longer to check a Self Assessment than it took to complete. A simpler system could result in a reduction of tax inspectors.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
